meToolkit 0.3.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

Full Apps

These built an entire me app from either preloaded data or data uploaded in csv form.

build_me_w_loader()

Run a ME app with data loading screen

build_me_dashboard()

Run main ME dashboard interface from supplied data

Shiny Modules

The shiny modules that make up a ME app. If building a customized app these are the building blocks.

main_dashboard_UI()

Main Multimorbidity Explorer Dashboard: UI

main_dashboard()

Main Multimorbidity Explorer Dashboard: Server

data_loader_UI()

Data loading screen: UI

data_loader()

Data loading screen: Server

upset_UI()

Upset plot of multimorbidity patterns: UI

upset()

Upset plot of multimorbidity patterns: Server

network_plot_UI()

Subject-level network diagram: UI

network_plot()

Subject-level network diagram: Server

manhattan_plot_and_table_UI()

Interactive manhattan plot and table: UI

manhattan_plot_and_table()

Interactive manhattan plot and table: Server

info_panel_UI()

SNP info panel: UI

info_panel()

SNP info panel: Server

Helpers

Functions that help with data cleaning or statistical testing

calc_pattern_risk_ratio()

Calculate risk ratio confidence interval

normalize_phecodes()

Normalize a phecode vector to padded character

Simulation

Functions to simulate the data used in the ME apps

sim_individual_data()

Generate sample individual level data based upon a PheWAS results set

sim_phewas_results()

Simulate PheWAS results

Contents

  • Full Apps
  • Shiny Modules
  • Helpers
  • Simulation
